Name: Snowball Christmas festival
About the game: Snowball Christmas festival is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music. Features: - Beautiful CG art (more 50+). - Interesting Puzzle levels. - Nice music.
